ygData.subject: Enchanters
ygData.msgSnippet: Mersinaz had an animation then charmed the Undead Froglok Executioner because it had an axe and we used it to kill the cavalier, sadly I won neither random and
ygData.messageBody:
Mersinaz had an animation then charmed the Undead Froglok Executioner because it
had an axe and we used it to kill the cavalier, sadly I won neither random and
misssed out on the axe and the apolets, of course I was the only warrior and the
only on able to use the axe

Efrieum

Tekdruid wrote:

> From: Tekdruid <Tekdruid@...>
>
> On Thursday, December 02, 1999 12:00 AM, Monica Bradlee
> [SMTP:mbradlee@...] wrote:
> > From: Monica Bradlee <mbradlee@...>
> >
> >
> > On what someone else said about enchanters, Animations don't count as pets so
> > the creature dubbed "evil eye pet" is actually an animation not a pet, they
> > just screwed up when the text wrote it
> >
> > Efrieum
> > Level 35 warrior
> > gonna have a pet and gonna name it Binky
> >
>
> Actually, for players, animations do count as pets. I have tried many times
> (usually accidentally) to charm a creature while I had my animation, and I got
> that old familiar message.
>
> Tinik
> Enchanter, Veeshan
>
>
